chart_description: This chart displays the system CPU time used by different user groups. The CPU time here denotes time spent executing system calls on behalf of the user group.

dimension_descriptions.1000: CPU time used by the user group with a numeric ID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.65532: CPU time used by the user group with a numeric ID 65532.
dimension_descriptions.libvirt: CPU time used by the Libvirt virtualization API user group.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: CPU time used by the message bus user group.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: CPU time used by the Netdata server user group.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: CPU time used by the Nobody group.
dimension_descriptions.root: CPU time used by the Root user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: CPU time used by the systemd-coredump user group.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: CPU time used by the XFS user group.
